title: System Error stoping me from playing any game!
body:
Every time I try and get into a game, if its just a normal game or TFT I get a system error and the game don't load. I have tried different ways to try and fix this but non of them have worked.

This is not the experience I was expecting for a new LoL player.

replies.body:
If you copied the install from elsewhere it can cause all sorts of problems. Bad or spotty connection while installing/patching can also cause endless grief.

You don't mention particularly what fixes you have tried, but there are 3 I would recommend:

1. Make sure your GPU drivers are up to date.
2. Run a client repair (Settings Gear in top right of client > Initiate Full Repair).
3. Do a clean uninstall with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool), then redownload the game.

If all else fails you can submit a ticket to player support and they should be able to help you: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I would also recommend checking your PC/Mac meets the minimum technical requirements.

Thx for the info. I could play the game for a bit yesterday, but as I tried to enter a game today the error just keeped showing up every time it tried loading the game. My PC can run LoL and Initiate Full Repair don't work, nether dose Hextech.

If you have more suggestions I would love to here them.
Submit a ticket, beyond that it could be any number of things that I'm not knowledgeable enough to pinpoint. Support can help you more than me at this point.
